data.description: A collection of planar geometry functions
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
As suggested by brian d foy, I changed Math:Geometry_2D to
    Math::Geometry::Planar (I have to admint, this is a far better
    choice). Place refer to the namespace request for Geometry_2D for
    further details.
